title: No LP after ranked win
body: Hey, I don't usually play ranked but I decided to do one earlier tonight and I went to look and see how much LP I got for the win and I was sitting at 0 still. Kinda upsetting, especially since I planned to climb a bit.

replies.body:
I actually played Bard support and it says +89 LP but I don't have any.
Below is the match:
https://gyazo.com/a8b66caf4d4804fe66a0d78377a395ab

https://gyazo.com/fa6c6369206431079385b6f56cbad70b

I also downloaded the replay, but I do not know how to attach that.

I looked into this for you, and I found the match but it seems to have resulted in a loss.  :/  This is the game where you were played as Nami support.  The good news is that you're recently seeded so you have the rest of the season ahead of you!
